UN Goodwill Envoy Angelina Jolie arrives in the Turkish province of Hatay.
Actresses Annette Bening and Katie Holmes are honored by Women in Film in Beverly Hills.
Cameron Diaz visits Berlin to promote her new movie, "Bad Teacher".
The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame puts Lady Gaga's infamous meat dress on public display.
Selena Gomez hits the mall in Los Angeles as part of a nine-city tour promoting her new album and upcoming film.
Celebrities arrive at the 2011 Tony Awards in New York City.
